3.「プリズランポイントの交換期間は| <%nM_trade_end_m>月<%nM: The Prizelan point redemption period is|<%nM_trade_end_m> month <%nM_trade_end_d>|day... Please note that...<end>

4.「あなたは パーティを組んでるから| パーティメンバーと一緒に 参加してもらうわ:
You're in a party, so if you'd like to join|with your party members... Just have the|party leader contact me and let me know|
|you're coming. And then you'll receive an|invitation to the Midnight Prizefighter from|the party leader.

5.「残念だけど 真夜中プリズランの開催期間は| 終わってしまったの。| 機会があっ: I'm sorry, but the Midnight Prizefighter is|no longer in session. If you get a chance,|please come back and play...<bw_break>

7.「真夜中プリズランは ８人の冒険者たちが| 追跡チーム３人と 逃走チーム５人に|:
In Midnight Prison Run, eight adventurers are|divided into three pursuit teams and five|escape teams. The chase team must catch all|
|five members of the escape team within the|time limit... The escape team has until the|end of the hour...

8.「参加者は 皆 あなたと同じ冒険者。| 『自動で探す』と『パーティを選ぶ』で|:
All the participants are just like you... Use|Auto-find and Pick a Party to find people to|play with... Auto-find lets you find your own|
|party members and other adventurers to play|with. Choose a Party lets you choose a party|to play with. This one's for when you're just|
|playing with people you know. Whichever way|you choose to play, we'll assign you a team.

9.「追跡チームは 逃走チームに近づいて | <convenience>で ハンドを:
The pursuit team is closing in on the getaway team|And you're going to fly your hands out there|and you're going to catch him. How many hands|do you have? If you run out, you won't be|
|able to catch anyone for a while. You'll have|to wait until it recovers automatically. If|you take the Catching Hand, you can increase|
|your hand count by three. It also restores|your hand count. The maximum number of hands|you can have is 10. If you take more than|
|that, you will recover. The catcher's hand|disappears when the fleeing team touches it.|Whichever team finds it, it must be taken|
|immediately. When the Catching Hand appears,|it will appear on the map, and you will|see...

We're going to play Prison Run at midnight,|aren't we? But first, I'm gonna need you to|take the Prizefighter's Guide, if that's|
|okay.

19.「一緒に遊ぶ仲間を どうやって決めるのかしら？|<select_se_off>|: How do they decide who to play with?|<select_se_off>|Automatic search|Select a party|<select_end><close>

20.「４人で パーティを組んでいれば 一緒に遊ぶ| もうひとつのパーティが 選べるわ:
If you have a party of four, you can choose|another party to play with... But you won't|get any Prisoner Points. Is that okay with|
|you?

21.「逃走チームは 仲間が捕まってしまったら| プリズンロックに ５回 アタックして:
If your getaway team gets caught, you'll have|to tackle Prison Rock five times to get him|out. You can do this by... Approach Prison|
|Rock.Press... In addition to attacking the Prison|Key, you can also break one of the locks on|the Prison Lock by touching it. The fifth|
|lock, however, cannot be destroyed by the|Prison Key, so the last thing you need to do|is attack Prison Lock directly. The Prison|
|Key disappears when it's touched by the|pursuing team. So, whichever team finds it,|take it immediately. When the Prison Key|
|appears, it'll show up on the map so you can|see...

22.「お助けボックスは 追跡チーム専用と| 逃走チーム専用のものを 用意しているわ。:
We have two help boxes, one for the chase|team and one for the escape team. You can't|take the helper box that belongs to the other|
|team, so be careful... Each helper box|contains a special item, a clairvoyant, that|will tell you where the other team is on the|
|map.If you hold it down, it'll affect everyone on|your team. If you use it right, it can give|your team a huge advantage... But as powerful|
|as clairvoyance is... it doesn't last long.|As soon as you use it, you'll see the map...

23.「ワープウィングは 触れると 一瞬で| 別の場所に ワープできちゃうアイテムよ。:
The Warp Wing is a device that allows you to|warp to another location in the blink of an|eye... You can see where you're warping to on|
|the map... It can be used by either team, so|it's useful for both pursuit and escape. Use|it to your advantage and run like the wind|
|through the city!

24.「真夜中プリズランで 遊ぶと| 勝ち負けに かかわらず| プリズランポイントが:
If you play the Midnight Prizefighter,|whether you win or lose, you'll earn|Prizefighter points. And if you do well,|
|you'll be rewarded with extra points... If|you choose to play as a party, you will not|receive any Prisoner Points. Once you've|
|earned your Prisoner Points, you can exchange|them for cool prizes. However, the exchange|period is limited... You can redeem your|
|Prisoner Points on <%nM_trade_end_m>days of|the month... Once that period is over, your|Prisoner Points will be gone, so don't forget|
|to exchange them...

25.「わたしは こう見えて 伝統文化の研究者なの。| 最近 はやりの 仮装メイク術も:
I'm a student of traditional culture... I'm|also very interested in the recent popularity|of masquerade makeup as a new culture. I'm a|
|researcher, which is why I decided to include|masquerade makeup in the Midnight Prizelan.|I've always loved making and wearing|
|costumes, so I started out with a lot of|different outfits. But lately, I've been|wearing this... After all, it's good for|
|catching what you find... After Rango, I'm|going to capture that ghost make-up artist|and make him my henchman! And I'll have to do|
|something about that gargoyle-wearing sister|of mine who's always babbling about|treasure... But I can't believe you're going|
|to play with me in my costume. I'm getting an|itch just thinking about it.

26.「そう……残念だわ。| 気が変わったら また 来てちょうだいね。: So... Stay... If you change your mind, you|can come back...
